title: Texas Instruments makes a $7.5B deal no one saw coming
title_zh: 德州仪器 (TI) 达成一项无人预见的 7.5B 美元交易
summary: In a move that caught Wall Street off guard, semiconductor giant Texas Instruments (TI) revealed that it is acquiringSilicon Labs. The news comes a week after TI announced its fourth-quarter earnings on Jan. 27, and coincides with Silicon Labs’ Q4 report, released Feb. 4.
summary_zh: 半导体巨头德州仪器 (TI) 透露，其正在收购 Silicon Labs，此举令华尔街措手不及。这一消息是在 TI 于 1 月 27 日公布第四季度收益一周后发布的，与 Silicon Labs 于 2 月 4 日发布的第四季度报告一致。

title: Alphabet won’t talk about the Google-Apple AI deal, even to investors
title_zh: Alphabet 不会谈论谷歌与苹果的人工智能交易，即使是对投资者
summary: Alphabet CEO skipped an analyst's question about Apple on the company's earnings call.
summary_zh: Alphabet 首席执行官在公司财报电话会议上跳过了分析师有关苹果的问题。

title: The Dealmaking 3: Super Bowl LX & Top Issues Behind Big Game
title_zh: 交易 3：超级碗 LX 和大型比赛背后的热门问题
summary: Watch The Dealmaking 3 of the Week Below: This week of The Dealmaking 3 with “The Sports Professor” Rick Horrow features a Super Bowl special, with $1 million in the Big Game ads costs and sold out ads, $1.7 billion in its expected legal wagers, $129 per viewer spending with m...
summary_zh: 观看本周《The Dealmaking 3》：本周《体育教授》里克·霍罗 (Rick Horrow) 主持的《The Dealmaking 3》特别推出了超级碗特别节目，其中大型比赛的广告费用和广告售罄额为 100 万美元，预期合法投注额为 17 亿美元，每位观众在 m...

title: KKR Makes AI Play With Nearly $11 Billion Asia Data-Center Deal
title_zh: KKR 通过近 110 亿美元的亚洲数据中心交易让人工智能发挥作用
summary: A  KKR  -led consortium has agreed to acquire a Singapore data-center company valued at $10.9 billion, marking the U.S. firm’s largest Asia-Pacific infrastructure investment yet as the AI frenzy fuels demand for tech assets.
summary_zh: KKR 领导的财团已同意以 109 亿美元的价格收购一家新加坡数据中心公司，这是该美国公司迄今为止最大的亚太基础设施投资，因为人工智能热潮刺激了对科技资产的需求。

title: M&A Deals Thriving in 2025: ETFs in Focus
title_zh: 2025 年并购交易蓬勃发展：ETF 成为焦点
summary: M&A deals are booming in 2025 despite fewer transactions -- megadeals, AI bets and Fed cuts may fuel ETFs like MNA, IAI, KBWB & CHAT.
summary_zh: 尽管交易量减少，但 2025 年并购交易仍将蓬勃发展——大型交易、人工智能押注和美联储降息可能会推动 MNA、IAI、KBWB 和 CHAT 等 ETF 的发展。
